name: Cozy Cabin Conundrum
description:
Cozy Cabin Conundrum:

In this game, you play as a vacationer at a cabin that becomes increasingly strange as you stay longer. Your goal is to find all five pieces of the MEGA QUILT in order to achieve maximum coziness. However, you must also gather resources and avoid negative conditions like exhaustion, being drenched, and becoming sick in order to succeed. You will need to carefully manage your resources and avoid any uncomfortable ailments as you explore the seemingly infinite rooms of the cabin and search for the Quilt pieces. The ultimate goal is to complete the MEGA QUILT and maintain your comfort level long enough to win the game.

Made in 48 hours for the Winter Melon Jam hosted by the Cupertino Game Dev Club
